## ParticleEmitterEventPayloads."PARTICLE\_EMITTER.SET\_PAUSED" property

Emitted when the paused state of an emitted particle is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[ParticleEmitterEvent.SET_PAUSED]: {
        particleEmitter: ParticleEmitter;
        paused: boolean;
    };
```
